_comment: TS searc parameters. Remove the line for using default parameters, e.g., nprocesses: using all CPU cores
num_per_cycle shall be no less than nprocesses to benefit from multiprocessing
If a negative score is preferred, the scaling should be negative
stop criteira if no new compound is sampled for n times on a roll
true for running on SLURM otherwise false. default: true
remove the corresponding line for any default para
